spirits/other-spirits.name: Rosemullion - Christmas Miniature Spirit
spirits/other-spirits.description:
A blend of traditional Christmas herbs and spices, infused with our own fermented alcohol to produce a Yuletide spirit. You will find notes of nutmeg, cloves, candied orange, raisins, ginger and muscovado sugar.
Nice on its own, or lovely served wit... Click for more info

spirits/other-spirits.name: Rosemullion - Navy Strength Miniature Rum
spirits/other-spirits.description:
A 54.5% rum fermented, distilled and aged in Cornwall.
Carrying a light spice & botanical flavour profile with deeper notes coming from the source molasses – lightly sweetened with no caramel. A smooth easy drinking rum that works with ice. Click for more info

spirits/other-spirits.name: Rosemullion - Botanical Honey Miniature Rum
spirits/other-spirits.description: 100% single pot distilled rum, aged with a perfect balance of Botanicals and southwest Honey to complement the Cornish rum. Click for more info

spirits/other-spirits.name: Rosemullion - Chocolate Miniature Rum
spirits/other-spirits.description:
100% single pot distilled rum, aged with a chocolate, raspberry and mango to complement the Cornish rum.
Works well in a simple rum and coke. Click for more info

spirits/other-spirits.name: Rosemullion - White Miniature Rum
spirits/other-spirits.description:
A white rum fermented, distilled and aged in Cornwall that is supple and luxurious, with a smooth finish.
The depth of flavour reflects the fermentation and distillation process that produces an excellent mixing rum. Click for more info
